p.k: Love Chapter 2 by Sharon Eyal and Gai Behar, Festival de Montpellier danse. Réalisateurs: Louise Narboni, Vincent Massip (2017).
p.d:
Love Chapter 2 Sharon Eyal & Gai Behar, choreographers For 6 dancers 2017 creation L-E-V company Ori Lichtik , music Alon Cohen, lighting
With Gon Biran, Darren Davaney, Rebecca Hytting,Leo Lerus, Mariko Kakizaki, Keren Lurie Pardes
Recorded on 6th and 7th July 2017 at the Opéra Comédie de Montpellier, Festival de Montpellier Danse TV Director, Louise Narboni et Vincent Massip
